name: dflow
description: is a minimal Dataflow programming engine

scripts.build: npm test && npm run browserify && npm run minify && npm run jekyll; npm run git_add-f; git status
scripts.bower: npm run bower_install; npm run git_add-f_bower_components
scripts.browserify: for x in dist examples test_engine; do npm run browserify_$x; done
scripts.coverage: npm run istanbul && npm run coveralls
scripts.gh-pages_push: git subtree --prefix gh-pages push origin gh-pages
scripts.gh-pages_pull: git subtree --prefix gh-pages pull origin gh-pages
scripts.git_add-f: for x in bundle test_bundle; do npm run git_add-f_$x; done
scripts.homepage:
echo "---
title: $npm_package_name
---" > gh-pages/index.md; cat README.md >> gh-pages/index.md
scripts.jekyll: npm run homepage; npm run cp_package.json; cd gh-pages; jekyll build; cd ..
scripts.lint: for x in src test; do npm run lint_$x; done
scripts.lint_test: cd test; standard --global describe --global it; cd -
scripts.postversion: git push origin v${npm_package_version}; npm publish; npm run _push
scripts.postupdate-deps: npm test && git commit -am 'updated deps' || git checkout -- package.json
scripts.pull: git pull origin master && npm run gh-pages_pull
scripts.push: git push origin master && npm run gh-pages_push
